about_the_game:
"RPG Maker MV", "RPG Maker MZ" bundled sound, North Sound that worked on SE etc.
One pack of gems to send to all Maker series users!
With this pack, you can cover the music from the opening to the ending of the game that you are developing!

*******************************************

BGM:
Battle music: 6 files
Castle music：1 files
Dungeon music：3 files
Field music：3 files
Theme music：4 files
Toen music：3 files
Vehicle music：2 files
Singing music：2 files

ME：21 files

45 files in total
*******************************************
